title.rendered: Incredible Duplex 3 Bedroom Apartment on Ally 31 Xuan Dieu

content.rendered:
Discover the charm of an Indochine-style duplex apartment on Alley 31 Xuan Dieu. Situated in a brand new building in a tranquil area, this residence offers modern comfort with traditional elegance. Ideal for those seeking a serene living environment in the heart of the city.

Landlord cannot currently offer a VAT reciept
